results.content:
I bought 2 more courses on same topic- ibm watson, but at different prices, although i can afford them all, but i think this course is worth more price as the quantity and content we get here is heavily underpriced.
You cannot get same content at this price elsewhere.

results.content:
Although there are some courses available on udemy to address IBM watson cognitive services, but there is rarely any effort given for teaching from the grassroot till uphill. No in-depth explanation or advanced examples are taught, just a basic overview of services like text-to-speech, and conversation.

But this course as i found is not just detailed but some of the examples are really comprehensive, like advanced discovery and more. I personally recommend this course for intermediate and advanced developers with no or little idea about IBM watson. Also instructor seems to be adding more content over time, as he does in his other courses.

results.content:
Content delivery and communication is really bad. 
a) Ideally this courses should remained to basic Watson service introduction or demo. People looking for deeper insights should  not take it.
b) Instructor communication is really funny and full of grammatical mistakes. English is really bad and feels like he is reading from a transcript which is again full of errors.
